WorkflowInfo.Name: Clone Volume
WorkflowInfo.Description: Clones a volume based on given a snapshot
WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information

This workflow clones a volume based on a provided snapshot. This workflow should be triggered by a Self Service request.

Requirements:
* NetApp module is configured and Up.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the Self Service request):
* NetApp Cluster
* Vserver
* Clone Name
* Parent Volume
* Snapshot

Output
Succees / Failure notice
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:NetAppCloneVolume;Assembly=NetAppCloneVolume, Version=4.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:SelfServiceResponse;Assembly=SelfServiceResponse, Version=4.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:NetAppCloneVolume TypeName="NetAppCloneVolume" ParentVolume="%Volume%" SelectedModuleType="23" HostName="%NetAppCluster%" SelectedModuleID="9" Username="" HostId="-2" Password="" CloneVolume="%Clone%" DisplayName="NetApp Clone Volume" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SelectedModuleName="NetApp" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Clone Volume" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" Vserver="%Vserver%" x:Name="NetAppCloneVolume1" ParentSnapshot="%Snapshot%" /><ns1:SelfServiceResponse x:Name="selfServiceResponse1" IsValid="True" DisplayName="SelfService Response" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Send response to self service request" TypeName="SelfServiceResponse" TerminationReason="%NetAppCloneVolume1%" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
